mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vaccresv(jumin, host_code, resv_date, resv_time, v_code) VALUES(#{dto.jumin}, #{dto.host_code}, TO_DATE(#{dto.resv_date}, 'YYYYMMDD'), CAST(#{dto.resv_time} AS TIME), #{dto.v_code})
mapper.select: SELECT h.host_addr, COUNT(v.resv_no) as count, (SELECT COUNT(resv_no) FROM vaccresv) as total_count FROM vaccresv v LEFT JOIN hospital h ON v.host_code = h.host_code GROUP BY h.host_addr

SELECT v.resv_no, j.name, j.jumin, v.host_code, TO_CHAR(v.resv_date, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS formatted_date, TO_CHAR(v.resv_time, 'HH:MI') AS formatted_time, v.v_code, h.host_addr FROM vaccresv v JOIN hospital h ON v.host_code = h.host_code JOIN jumin j ON v.jumin = j.jumin WHERE v.resv_no = CAST(#{keyword} AS bigint);
SELECT * FROM vaccresv WHERE jumin LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
